thread.title: See All The Gorgeous Gowns From the 2017 Oscars Red Carpet
thread.title_full: See All The Gorgeous Gowns From the 2017 Oscars Red Carpet

title: See All The Gorgeous Gowns From the 2017 Oscars Red Carpet
text: See All The Gorgeous Gowns From the 2017 Oscars Red Carpet These dresses deserve their own golden statue. Share via Twitter The Oscars are the grand finale to an amazing award season. For two months straight, the top Hollywood actors and actresses attend award show after award show wearing fabulous gowns, but it's the couture creations from the Oscars that are often remembered for years after their worn . At the 89th Annual Academy Awards there was tulle, sequins, and taffeta galore (oh, and don't forget all the sparkling diamonds). And we've gathered all the amazing red-carpet dresses from the 2017 Oscars ahead. 1 Taraji P. Henson Henson's Alberta Ferretti gown had an element of Old Hollywood glamour with a thigh-high slit and off-the-shoulder neckline. Frazer Harrison / Getty Images 2 Karlie Kloss It was an all-white moment for the supermodel, and she also accessorized her gown with a blue ACLU ribbon. Frazer Harrison / Getty Images 3 Felicity Jones Jones arrived on the Oscars red carpet in a stunning ivory gown that showed off her fancy metallic heels. Frazer Harrison/Getty Images 4 Ruth Negga The Loving actress accented her custom-made, red Valentino gown with a blue ribbon in honor of the American Civil Liberties Union. Kevin Mazur / Getty Images 5 Emma Roberts Roberts chose her vintage Armani Priv√© gown as a part of the Red Carpet Green Dress initiative. Kevin Mazur / Getty Images
